trans-unit.source: Asynchronous callbacks are invoked by the browser or by some framework like the Google geocoding library when events happen. There's no place for returned values to go. A callback function can return a value, in other words, but the code that calls the function won't pay attention to the return value.
trans-unit.target: 发生事件时，浏览器或Google地理编码库之类的框架会调用异步回调。没有地方可以返回值。换句话说，回调函数可以返回一个值，但是调用该函数的代码不会注意返回值。

trans-unit.source: How to return value from an asynchronous callback function
trans-unit.target: 如何从异步回调函数中返回值

trans-unit.source: I want to get some value from callback. Look at the script below for clarification.
trans-unit.target: 我想从回调中获得一些价值。请看下面的脚本来说明一下。

trans-unit.source: If I try to return that value just getting "undefined". I followed some ideas from SO, but still fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果我尝试返回这个值,只会得到 "undefined"。我遵循了SO的一些想法,但还是失败了。

trans-unit.source: If you happen to be using jQuery, you might want to give this a shot: http://api.jquery.com/category/deferred-object/
trans-unit.target: 如果您碰巧正在使用jQuery，则可能需要尝试一下：http : //api.jquery.com/category/deferred-object/

trans-unit.source: If you have a lot of callbacks you might consider taking the plunge and use a promise library like Q.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有很多回调，则可以考虑尝试并使用诸如Q的promise库。

trans-unit.source: In this case you need to pass a callback to foo that will receive the return value
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,你需要传递一个回调给foo,它将接收返回的值

trans-unit.source: It allows you to defer the execution of your callback function until the ajax request (or any async operation) is completed. This can also be used to call a callback once several ajax requests have all completed.
trans-unit.target: 它允许你将回调函数的执行推迟到ajax请求(或任何异步操作)完成后再执行。这也可以用来在几个ajax请求全部完成后调用回调。

trans-unit.source: It makes no sense to return values from a callback. Instead, do the "foo()" work you want to do inside your callback.
trans-unit.target: 从回调返回值没有任何意义。而是在回调中执行您要执行的“ foo（）”工作。

trans-unit.source: The thing is, if an inner function call is asynchronous, then all the functions 'wrapping' this call must also be asynchronous in order to 'return' a response.
trans-unit.target: 问题是,如果一个内部函数调用是异步的,那么所有 "包装 "这个调用的函数也必须是异步的,这样才能 "返回 "一个响应。

trans-unit.source: This is impossible as you cannot return from an asynchronous call inside a synchronous method.
trans-unit.target: 这是不可能的,因为你不能从同步方法内部的异步调用返回。

trans-unit.source: This question is asked many times in SO. But still I can't get stuff.
trans-unit.target: 这个问题在SO里问了很多次。但我还是拿不到东西。
